content:
parishuddhanmaarkkaayu kaakka-
ppetumudyaanam-pookaayvaanenne
/tveli-kkoppam nerkkunnen'
/tkatamo-rtthundu bhayam naathaa!
Narakattheennenneyetti
paarppikkuka nin-hithamotthaa dikkil.

rakshakaneshu mahaaraajaa!
Sthuthi cheyyunnen-anuthaapakkaar mun
/tnin vaa-thil thuranneetunnu
/tellaa-nanmayumekum nin-
nanthuniyaavaanenne nin-
nalvarameki-santhoshippikka.

1. Dushtanmaaril kaa-runyam poondone!
Kaarunyam cheyu nin-nyaaya-ttheerppin naal.

2. Duakham poondor nin-vaathil muttunnu
kaarunyatthaal nal-kenam yaachanaye

4. Vinnavar than naathaa!- manmayaraashayume!
Kykkondikkarmmam-kaarunyam cheyka.

items.content:
kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname
kykkondatiyaarute karmmam
poruthi ayaccharulaname nin
arayeennalivumanugrahavum.

Nidra vetinjittunarvvotu njaan
nin mun nilkkaaraakaname.
Veendumurangilathil paapam
theendukayum cheyyaruthe njaan.

Akramamunarvvil cheykil njaan
pokkaname naathaa! Krupayaal
nidrayil njaan pizha cheythenkil
nin krupa mochanamarulaname.

Elimayezhum nin kurishineyor-
tthekanamatiyanu sukhanidra
maayaaroopakkaazhchakalil
paayaathenne rakshikka.

Svachchhandamurangunneram
dushchinthakal dushtanmaarum
enne vannu bharikkaayvaan
ee raavil kaakkanamenne.

En dehamashesham kaappaan
ekuka velivin doothane nee.
Nin meyu njaan bhakshicchathinaal
durmmohe veezharuthe njaan.

Aashvaasatthoturangumeni-
kkaavuka nin raktham kaaval
ee nin sadrushamathaam srushti-
kkekaname nin svaathanthuyam.

Nin kyvelayathaam meynmel
nin്re valamky mevaname
parichaykkoppam kaakkuka
nin-karunakkotta valanjenne.

Meyyithurangumpol kaaval
cheyyaname ninnute shakthi
elkkaname nal dhoopam pol
enteyurakkam thirumumpil.

Nin maathrupraarththanayaalen
shayyaykkanayaruthe dushtan
saatthaan himsikkaathenne nin
baliyavane vilakkaname.

Nin vaakkennil nivartthikka
nin kurishennuyir kaatthituka
enne thaangiya ninnanpaal
ninne unarvvil sthuthi cheyaan

ninnishtam kettathine njaan
anuvartthippaan kartthaave!
Neethiyezhunnoru raavumeni-
kkekaname nal sandhyayathum.

Velivaam mashihaa rakshakaa nin
veliviltthanne nin vaasam
velivin puthranmaar ninne-
tthanne vandiccheetunnu.

/tvelivil vasikkunnulakatthin
/trakshakanaameesho sthothram.
/tihaparalokangalil ninte
/tkrupa njangalilundaakaname.

Sthothram sthothram kartthaave!
Sthothramathaayiramaayiramaayu
anavadhiyaayu sthothram naathaa!
Krupa venam njangalilennum.

/tsthothram! Maalaakhakal shushroo-
/tshiccheerayar vandippavane!
/tpraarththana kelkkeerayaruteyum
/tmaalaakhakaluteyum naathaa!

Thrithvekathvavumekathva-
thrithvavumaayi sthithi cheyyum
pithrusutha parishuddhaathmaavaam
sathyekaparannaayu sthothram.

/tbalaheena janapraarththanaye
/tkelpponum kaazhchakal pole
/tanuthaapam poondor kanneer
/tkykkollunnavanum sthothram.

Eerayar shushrooshippone!
Maalaakhakal vaazhtthunnone!
Vrukshadala'tthin samkhyayil man-
mayar ninne sthuthi cheyyunnu.

/tpithrusuthaparishuddhaathmakanaam
/tsathyekaparannaayu sthothram
/tcheytheetenam naam sathya-
/tjnjaanavivekatthotu kooti.

Mruthikara vishamaam pon velli
dhanamayyo netaruthe nee
thetuka sukhakaramupadesham
ninne naathan snehippaan.

/tnaalpathu nompathu nokkuka nee
/t theettuka theenillaatthavare
/teeshaayisuthanoppam nee
/tpraarththikkuka dinamezhoozham.

Naalpathu naalinnupavaasam
moosha kazhiccheleeyaayum,
naathan shathruvine vennu
naalpathu naalupavaasatthaal.

/tkatal kuzhi agnicchoolakalil
/tninnu kareriya praarththanakal
/tatiyaarute praarththanakalkkum
/tkrupayaal vaathil thurakkaname.

Praarththana ketteetunnavane!
Yaachana nalkeetunnavane!
Praarththana kettu nirappaayi
krupayaal yaachana nalkaname.
